reviewText: Based on short stories by the incomparable pacifist-feminist activist Grace Paley - and beautifully converted to film. A wonder. It's sad that it's not available in a format that those of us in the US can view. I saw it when it came out, and loved it. But I'd love to see it again. On my list of top 10 favorite feminist and/or pro-feminist films ([...]), I ranked this film at #1.
